seo.title: Budżet w Positano: rozbicie kosztów
seo.description: Przykładowy dzienny budżet: nocleg, jedzenie, transport, atrakcje i zapas na niespodzianki.

sections.title: Where your stay budget goes
body: Dorm beds at Hostel Brikette hover between €30–€55 depending on season; private rooms start near €110.

sections.title: Food & drink
body: Breakfast pastries and coffee cost €4–€6; casual panini lunches land around €8 (US$9).
Dinner at mid-range trattorias averages €20–€30 per person excluding wine; split appetisers to sample more without doubling spend.

sections.title: Activities & extras
body: Allocate €5–€10 for gelato, granita, or busking tips so your daily spend feels generous yet controlled.

faqs.q: What is a realistic daily budget?
